name: httperrors
description: Handy JavaScript Error classes representing the standard HTTP errors. Easily extensible and subclassable.

scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify ./lib/HttpError.js -s HttpError | ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -mc > ./dist/httpErrors.js && cp dist/httpErrors.js dist/HttpError.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run dist
